Article Title: MEA flags expansion of H-1B review
Article Text:
Representative image

NEW DELHI: India has flagged concerns over the US expansion of its H-1B visa programme review, saying it has caused hardship to Indian families.MEA said it received representations from nationals facing delays and problems in rescheduling visa appointments.MEA spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said India had raised the issue with US in New Delhi and DC, hoping disruptions would be addressed.He said prolonged appointment delays stranded people, affecting family life and children‚Äôs education. The US expanded H-1B reviews from Dec 15, including H-4 dependents, globally. India remains engaged to minimise disruptions and support affected Indian professionals abroad.
Article Summary: Mea said it received representations from nationals facing delays and problems in rescheduling visa appointments. Us expanded h-1b reviews from dec 15, including h-4 dependents, globally. India remains engaged to minimise disruptions and support affected indian professionals abroad.

Article Title: ‚Äò$600 mobile bills in New York‚Äô: NRI visits home after 8 years; viralpost praises India‚Äôs growth and affordability
Article Text:
AI image

.

.

NEW DELHI: An NRI‚Äôs praise for India after returning home following an eight-year gap has become viral.Investor Alok Jain wrote on X that a friend from New York had recently visited him. According to Jain, the visitor was struck by the energy in the country and how fast India appeared to be growing.‚ÄúAn outsider‚Äôs perspective can be so different from our own,‚Äù Jain wrote, comparing it to how people living here may see the country.In his post, Jain said his friend was particularly surprised by how affordable many things in India were. He mentioned medical care, transport, internet and mobile services.The visitor compared these with costs in the US. According to Jain, his friend "pays $600 for mobile and data at his house Pays $30k for health insurance for 4!! Per annum Pays 2 percent as property taxes per year..!!"Jain added that while air quality was better in the US, many good things were happening in India.The post drew a range of responses from social media users. One person wrote that many of their friends living in Bengaluru preferred it to New York City.Another user commented that from an outsider‚Äôs point of view, India‚Äôs main problems came down to a lack of civic sense. "I am an outsider and I can say that everything wrong with the country has to do only with lack of civic sense among the people," he wrote.Someone who said they had lived in the Bay Area and were currently based in New York, agreed that phone bills and insurance costs in the US was high, but said salaries were also much higher, making direct comparisons difficult.The user added that property taxes varied by state and often fund services like public schools and clean roads. They said India stood out in areas such as access to medical care for those who can afford it, digital public services, and the availability of affordable physical labour.
Article Summary: Investor alok jain wrote on x that a friend from new york had recently visited him. According to jain, the visitor was struck by the energy in the country and how fast india appeared to be growing. The post drew a range of responses from social media users.

Article Title: India's growth must heal, not harm: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat
Article Text:
File photo: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat

NEW DELHI: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat Friday said India's rise on the global stage is "certain" but must be guided by a humane responsibility to offer the world a meaningful development model.Speaking at the Bharatiya Vigyan Sammelan 2025 in Tirupati, he said Western development had brought material prosperity but also social and ecological distress.Bhagwat stressed that the purpose of development is sukh, not mere material satisfaction, warning against inequality-driven growth. India's progress, RSS chief said, must rest on balance, restraint and dharma.
Article Summary: Rss chief mohan bhagwat says india's rise on the global stage is "certain" he says western development has brought material prosperity but also social and ecological distress. India's progress must rest on balance, restraint and dharma, he says.

Article Title: BlueBird Block-2 mission: Isro releases rare onboard camera footage from liftoff to satellite separation ‚Äî Watch
Article Text:
ANI Photo

Bluebird Lift-Off Shows ISRO Commercial Power As Nambi Narayanan Calls LVM-3 Game Changer Move

The Indian Space Research Organisation ( Isro ) on Wednesday released rare onboard camera footage from its heaviest rocket, LVM3-M6, offering a rocket-eye view of the BlueBird Block-2 mission from liftoff to satellite separation.The footage shared by Isro on X features visuals captured by cameras onboard and documents each major phase of the ascent. The footage shows the rocket lifting off from the second launch pad at the Satish Dhawan Space Centre in Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh, followed by the separation of the twin S200 solid strap-on boosters. It then captures the separation of the L110 liquid core stage and the jettisoning of the payload fairing, before concluding with the successful separation of the BlueBird Block-2 satellite into Low Earth Orbit.The stunning visuals were recorded during Isro‚Äôs successful commercial launch of the next-generation US communication satellite for AST SpaceMobile earlier in the day. The 6,100 kg satellite was placed into its intended orbit at an altitude of about 520 km, approximately 15 minutes after launch.The 43.5-metre-tall LVM3 lifted off at 8.55 am after the completion of a 24-hour countdown. Powered by two S200 solid boosters, a liquid core stage and a cryogenic upper stage, the rocket performed all mission events as planned.The space agency said the mission, designated LVM3-M6, marked the sixth operational flight of the LVM3 launch vehicle, nicknamed ‚ÄòBahubali‚Äô for its heavy-lift capability. Isro chief, Dr V Narayanan, described mission‚Äôs success as a "season‚Äôs gift" to the country.BlueBird Block-2 is part of a Low Earth Orbit constellation being developed by US-based AST SpaceMobile. The satellite is designed to enable direct-to-mobile connectivity, providing 4G and 5G voice and video calls, text messaging, streaming and data services directly to standard mobile smartphones.Developed by Isro, the three-stage LVM3 has a lift-off mass of 640 tonnes and a payload capability of 4,200 kg to Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit. In earlier missions, it has successfully launched Chandrayaan-2, Chandrayaan-3 and two OneWeb missions carrying 72 satellites.
Article Summary: Isro has released rare onboard camera footage from its heaviest rocket, lvm3-m6. The footage offers a rocket-eye view of the bluebird block-2 mission from liftoff to satellite separation. The stunning visuals were recorded during isro‚Äôs successful commercial launch of the next-generation us communication satellite for ast spacemobile.

Article Title: Sami Zayn and Khadija Sebei combined net worth in 2025: WWE salary, endorsements, and income
Article Text:
Sami Zayn and Khadija Sebei (Image Source: Pinterest)

Sami Zayn WWE salary and contract earnings

Endorsements, merchandise sales, and total household income

Sami Zayn‚Äôs wife on the most important match of his life: Elimination Chamber 2023 Diary

Originally named Rami Sebei, Sami Zayn has made a name for himself as one of the most respected and consistently pushed stars in the WWE Universe. Zayn has been a model of longevity, character work, and stable placement on premium live events, and his stability in that regard has equated to financial security. Industry-wide estimates have his individual net worth in the low millions as of the year 2025, primarily from his WWE contract and associated revenue streams like brand endorsements and deals.Khadija Sebei, wife of Zayn, lives under a very low profile, not being in any public business or entertainment business. It means any public appraisal of the couple's fortunes turns primarily on Zayn's professional earnings (no apparent records of independent commercial income linked to her name per se). Thus, their joint fortune is a poor reflection of the value the wrestler makes over a career, not of two parallel portfolios of income.Sami Zayn likely earned a WWE contract commensurate with his status as an invaluable veteran today who is not necessarily a marquee star. His annual WWE salary is estimated by various industry trackers in the range of $350,000 to $500,000. This number generally consists of a base salary that is guaranteed, bonuses that are based on performance, and pay that is based on premium live events and overseas tours.While it is rumored that emerging talent is on developmental deals, Zayn would be able to negotiate contracts that he has been earning with a consistent presence on television for years. When he is utilized in the many squad storylines and championship programs in a given year, or at the main event level for Pay-Per-Views, his earnings go up. Another benefit is that Zayn has built long-term sustainability as opposed to short-term surges.Sami Zayn also makes money off of merchandise royalties, which still plays an important role for veteran talent, on top of his WWE contract. Recurring revenue all year long comes from T-shirts, collectibles, and special event merchandise associated with major storylines. He has also ventured into limited media and entertainment work, including TV and streaming appearances, as additional sources of income.When all of the combined sources and standout earnings room are combined, responsible estimates place Sami Zayn's net worth at roughly $2 million in 2025. Aside from reportedly landing a three-year modelling contract with the major American brand this year, all fatigue to Khadija Sebei has proven to be a speculative wage, so combined, they can both expect a net worth in the ballpark of $2 million to $2.5 million at the most, to allow space for private investments and debts of others.Also Read: IShowSpeed‚Äôs latest YouTube drop features WWE legend Randy Orton
Article Summary: Sami zayn likely earned a wwe contract commensurate with his status as an invaluable veteran today. His annual wwe salary is estimated by various industry trackers in the range of $350,000 to $500,000. Recurring revenue all year long comes from t-shirts, collectibles, and special event merchandise associated with major storylines.

Article Title: George Russell and Carmen Montero Mundt combined net worth in 2025: Mercedes F1 salary, endorsements, brand deals, and more
Article Text:
George Russell and Carmen Montero Mundt (Image Source: Getty)

George Russell‚Äôs Mercedes F1 career, salary, and brand endorsements

Carmen Montero Mundt‚Äôs professional career and the net worth of the duo

George Russell will have made a significant imprint on the earnings of Formula One by the year 2025. Russell‚Äôs revenue path is very much like that of other top drivers, applying to their advantage the sporting success they have through the commercial opportunities that are open. His ability to combine competitive results with being marketable makes it so that he is able to quite steadily grow his wealth, especially as Mercedes has already placed him in the long-term design of their team. Carmen Montero Mundt, who is the partner of George, enables the couple to accumulate wealth together through her career in finance and investment management.George Russell‚Äôs new Mercedes contract, covering several years, is roughly ¬£30 million per annum, which puts him in the highest echelon with respect to driver salaries. Besides his basic salary, Russell‚Äôs net worth is estimated to be $16 million, which reflects not only his race winnings but also the inflating sponsorships that he has developed.Amongst the brand names attached to Russell are Puma, Bell Helmets, and Mercedes-Benz lifestyle campaigns, where he is the face, which together contribute to Russell being more visible than ever. His image, which is a polished one, together with the steady performances like podiums in Australia and a win in the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix, makes him a priceless brand ambassador.Carmen Montero Mundt has carved out a professional career of her own apart from her husband‚Äôs identity. She has worked in the UK, and her London financial firm's reputation is that of a private banker who specializes in wealthy clients' relations. While her net worth is low compared to Russell‚Äôs, it is estimated that it is somewhere in the range of $185,000 as the professional earnings in the present year. Apart from this, she also earns from investments and lifestyle collaborations.The total net worth of the couple is estimated to be around $16-$17 million in the present year. Apart from their professional careers, brands and investments have added to their growth scale.Also Read: George Russell‚Äôs romantic Alps retreat with Carmen Montero Mundt fuels engagement buzz as fans predict a proposal

His ability to combine competitive results with being marketable makes it so that he is able to quite steadily grow his wealth. Carmen montero mundt enables the couple to accumulate wealth together through her career in finance and investment management.

Article Title: Who is Matt Kalish and why Adin Ross is calling him out amidst FaZe Clan fallout
Article Text:
Adin Ross and Matt Kalish (via Getty Images)

Matt Kalish‚Äôs rise from DraftKings success and Adin Ross‚Äô latest claim

Police Hunt Antonio Brown After SHOCKING Shooting At Adin Ross Event; Warrant Out Against NFL Star





The FaZe Clan fallout has once again put the spotlight on Matt Kalish, most widely known as the co-founder of DraftKings. He is also the CEO of HardScope and a major stakeholder in FaZe Media. Kalish invested $11 million into FaZe Media at its formation, instantly becoming its largest stakeholder with a 49% ownership stakeThat kind of influence and control of the company was recently called out by popular streamer Adin Ross, who publicly questioned leadership decisions tied to FaZe Clan‚Äôs recent departures. Despite Kalish‚Äôs contributions, Ross is seeking clarification regarding certain business strategies and creative decisions within the company.Matt Kalish built his reputation long before FaZe Clan came into the limelight. As one of the original co-founders of DraftKings, he helped shape the fantasy sports industry into a billion-dollar market. He also launched HardScope with the aim of giving influencers more ownership and structure. With that vision, he started up FaZe Clan in 2024 when GameSquare acquired the brand and positioned it as a creator-first media company.His $11 million investment earned him a seat on the board, placing him at the center of important strategic decisions. He was a stabilizing force of the company, especially after years of financial turbulence surrounding the FaZe brand. However, this clean and consumer-friendly image has now shifted after Adin Ross accused company leadership of mishandling creator agreements.In a recent livestream, Ross directly called out Kalish and former FaZe Media CEO Richard ‚ÄúBanks‚Äù Bengtson for introducing revenue expectations too late in the process. He minced no words as he said, ‚ÄúBanks and Matt Kalish, you guys messed up, because initially, with the announcement video, you guys were supposed to make them sign‚Ä¶ You guys waited two years later. That's the issue‚Ä¶‚ÄùAccording to Ross, the reported request for 20% of creator revenue came only after streamers had already built large audiences. This led to former FaZe Clan members, including Lacy, Adapt, and Jasontheween, exiting the company. The issue further deepened when Banks, who left the company in July 2025, called those signings one of the worst decisions of his life. As of now, Matt Kalish has not publicly responded to these significant claims made by Ross.Also read: Adin Ross confirms person allegedly hit by Clavicular‚Äôs Tesla Cybertruck is alive
Article Summary: Matt kalish is the co-founder of draftkings and ceo of hardscope. He is also a major stakeholder in faze media with a 49% ownership stake. Kalish's influence and control of the company was recently called out by popular streamer adin ross. Ross is seeking clarification regarding certain business strategies and creative decisions within the company.

Article Title: Alexa Bliss and Ryan Cabrera combined net worth in 2025: WWE success, music career, royalties, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Alexa Bliss and Ryan Cabrera (Image Source: Getty)

Alexa Bliss‚Äô WWE success and evolving career earnings

Ryan Cabrera‚Äôs music career, royalties, and lifestyle choices

Alexa Bliss and Ryan Cabrera‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025 is estimated at around $6 million, reflecting two very different entertainment careers that intersect through marriage. It's one from the worldwide circus tent of pro wrestling, where a star's name value and staying power have always counted every bit as much, if not more than, wins and titles. One stems from the early-2000s pop-rock explosion when radio singles and CD sales could shape a career for decades. Combined, they give us a glimpse of what modern celebrity means in terms of money: less of one dominant moment and more of all the outlets contributing to success, the many streams and tributaries flowing into one range.Neither of them is one of the top 10 richest names in their industries, but their combined earnings reflect steadiness, brand, and the long-term dividend of remaining relevant. Their 2025 net worth includes WWE contracts, music royalties, occasional appearances, and a lifestyle that is comfortable but not flashy.Alexa Bliss has been one of the biggest women's stars for WWE over the last 10 years. A former several-time Raw and SmackDown Women‚Äôs Champion, her earnings have been primarily based on WWE base contracts, pay-per-view bonuses, merchandise royalties, and premium live event appearances.Her return to the active roster in 2025 elevated her earning capacity, since special presentation talent generally receives a much greater appearance fee and merch showcasing.Outside of the ring, Bliss makes plenty of money off sponsorships, media appearances, and a huge social media presence that opens up partnerships with brands. These extra income sources keep her finances stable, especially during times when she isn't in the ring full-time. Her personal fortune is estimated at between $3 million and $4 million, so she is the financial heavyweight of the couple.The early 2000s hitmaker had chart-topping singles and a certified-platinum debut album. Despite the loss of his mainstream radio presence, however, his catalogue lives on, earning money through streaming, licensing, and royalties. These long-term revenues often underpin the earnings of artists from that era.Cabrera also works as a catalyst; his income comes from occasional live performances, television appearances, and music-related projects. His estimated net worth in 2025 stands at roughly $2 million. Together with Alexa Bliss, their combined net worth of about $6 million reflects diversified income rather than explosive growth.Also Read: John Cena retired: List of all celebrities and WWE superstars who paid tribute to the GOAT
Article Summary: Alexa bliss and ryan cabrera‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025 is estimated at around $6 million. Their earnings reflect steadiness, brand, and the long-term dividend of remaining relevant. Their 2025 net worth includes wwe contracts, music royalties, occasional appearances, and a lifestyle that is comfortable but not flashy.

Article Title: Quinton Rampage Jackson surprises son with $275000 Christmas gift as emotional family moment goes viral
Article Text:
Quinton Rampage Jackson surprises son with $275000 Christmas gift as emotional family moment goes viral (Image via Getty)

Quinton Rampage Jackson gifts son Elijah Jackson a rare Audi R8 after keeping childhood promise

Quinton Rampage Jackson made Christmas very special this year. The former UFC light heavyweight champion surprised his youngest son with a gift many people only dream about. Just days before Christmas, Jackson shared that he spent about $275,000 on a car for his son, Elijah ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson. This was not a last-minute idea. Jackson said it was a promise he made when his son was very young. Years later, he finally kept that promise.The moment quickly went viral after Jackson posted it on X. Fans saw a proud father and a shocked son sharing a quiet but powerful moment together. The gift stood out not just because of the price, but because of the meaning behind it. Jackson did not buy something for himself. He chose to reward his son and celebrate family during the holidays. That message made the story travel fast across social media.Jackson revealed the surprise on X, where he posted a video from his garage. In the clip, Elijah Jackson walks in and sees a black Audi R8 waiting for him. He pauses, clearly stunned, and asks if the car is really his.Jackson replies with a calm smile and says, ‚ÄúLike I promised you when you were a kid.‚Äù He then reminds his son to drive carefully, warning him that the car is very fast.After that, he hands over the keys.The Audi R8 is one of the brand‚Äôs top sports cars. It comes with a V10 engine and a carbon-fiber body. According to Edmunds, newer Audi R8 models can cost up to $275,000, depending on features. Older versions can be cheaper, but Jackson did not share the exact model.Audi officially ended R8 production in March 2024, as confirmed by Audi. That has made existing models more valuable among car lovers.Jackson shares Elijah with his former wife, Yuki Imoto. He is also a father to other children, including daughter Naname Nakia Jackson. Still, this moment was fully about a father and son.Later, Jackson also spoke about his income today. During a livestream, he said streaming has paid him more than fighting ever did. ‚ÄúI have been streaming for eight months, and I made more than I did in my fighting career,‚Äù he said. He added that sponsors support him more now because more people watch his streams.Quinton Rampage Jackson streams travel videos, home life clips, and content with other creators. He also shared that having two kids in college pushed him to focus on streaming full-time. The success of that move made this Christmas promise possible.Also Read: Ex-UFC Champion Sean O‚ÄôMalley Flags Trouble For Dana White As The White House Card Faces Major Concern
Article Summary: Quinton rampage jackson surprises son with $275,000 christmas gift as emotional family moment goes viral. The former ufc light heavyweight champion surprised his youngest son with a gift many people only dream about. Jackson said it was a promise he made when his son was very young.

Article Title: Dak Prescott‚Äôs fianc√©e Sarah Jane Ramos appreciates Christmas flowers from Cowboys QB and shares his pregame look on Instagram
Article Text:
(Image via Instagram: Dak Prescott and Sarah Jane Ramos)

Sarah Jane Ramos sends a shoutout to Dak Prescott from home for winning the Cowboys vs. Commanders game on Christmas Day

Sarah Jane Ramos admires the Dallas Cowboys longtime signal caller‚Äôs stylish suit

While Dallas Cowboys star quarterback Dak Prescott played against the Washington Commanders on Christmas , his family, fianc√©e Sarah Jane Ramos, and daughters Margaret Jane ‚ÄúMJ‚Äù Rose and Aurora Rayne watched his game from home on TV. Sarah shared wholesome Christmas celebration photos on her Instagram story, starting with Aurora Rayne smiling on a gray Ford Bronco baby walker.The walker looks like a real Ford Bronco and features a removable steering wheel, authentic engine sounds, and lights for playtime. It offers two modes: a seated position for early exploration and stability, and a basic walker for lighter travel or when two babies play together. Aurora Rayne looked beyond adorable in her light beige top and baby pink bow. Sarah captioned it: ‚ÄúAre you kidding me?‚Äù followed by a happy-tears emoji, a white heart emoji, and a teary-eyed emoji.Sarah‚Äôs next Instagram story shows a TV screen over a modern kitchen platform, displaying the Cowboys vs. Commanders game from Christmas Day (12/25/25). Sarah captured the third quarter when the Cowboys were leading 24-10 with 12 minutes and 43 seconds left on the clock. The Cowboys eventually won the Christmas game [30-23]. She captioned it with three blue heart emojis.Next came Christmas flowers from Dak Prescott. Sarah shared an Instagram story showing three bouquets of lively red roses on a dining table.She captioned it: ‚ÄúDak made sure there were 3 sets of roses delivered on Christmas for his girls,‚Äù followed by a teary-eyed emoji and ‚ÄúBest daddy.‚ÄùThe following Instagram story showed MJ walking on a lawn, possibly a backyard, toward a plush white-and-black playset with a teal slide, black stairs, and two yellow swings. MJ is wearing a baby-pink pajama set with Santa‚Äôs face prints and bright red borders. Sarah called it ‚ÄúSpecial delivery,‚Äù followed by a Santa face emoji and a pinched-fingers emoji, which in K-pop terms means ‚ÄúI love you.‚ÄùThe following story showed MJ playing on the slide. It captured MJ‚Äôs back profile taken from inside the slide. MJ looks back with pure excitement gushing through her eyes. Sarah captioned it with a laughing emoji.The last story showed the Dallas Cowboys‚Äô IG post of the players‚Äô pregame outfits. Sarah reposted Dak Prescott‚Äôs photo from the IG post and captioned it: ‚Äú@stitchedbymitch this suit>.‚ÄùThe longtime Cowboys signal caller is wearing a stylish three-piece suit. The custom brown-and-black checkered suit was designed by Mitch Purgason, founder of Stitched By Mitch [custom clothing brand known for bespoke suits and garments for athletes in NFL and NASCAR, celebrities, business leaders and more].Prescott is wearing black boots with shiny red and green socks [a heartfelt Christmas tribute]. He is holding a coffee cup in one hand and a silver suitcase and black backpack in the other.Also Read: ‚ÄúThis is our job‚Äù: Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott refuses to cheat the game after being eliminated from the 2025 NFL Playoffs
Article Summary: Sarah jane ramos shared wholesome christmas celebration photos on her instagram story. Sarah shared an instagram story showing three bouquets of lively red roses on a dining table. Sarah reposted dak prescott‚Äôs photo from the ig post and captioned it: ‚Äú@stitchedbymitch this suit>.‚Äù

Article Title: Stefon Diggs reportedly posts his son‚Äôs photo on Instagram with special instructions for partner Cardi B
Article Text:
(Image via Instagram: Cardi B and Stefon Diggs)

Stefon Diggs instructs Cardi B to not squeeze their baby boy too tight

(Image via Stefon Diggs Instagram Story)

New England Patriots star wide receiver Stefon Diggs shared nine Instagram stories from his Christmas celebration. It began with the Patriots‚Äô IG post featuring New England‚Äôs star players, quarterback Drake Maye, tight end Hunter Henry, cornerback Christian Gonzalez, and wide receiver Stefon Diggs, in a Christmas painting. Next, Diggs held a silver-framed abstract art painting by one of the kids and captioned it: ‚Äú1 of 1‚Äù with four head shaking vertically emojis.In the next story, Diggs shared a custom football in a glass box with a painting of him and a baby. He captioned it with a hugging emoji and a mending heart emoji. The following story was a video of Diggs dancing with two kids in red pajamas near the kitchen platform. Diggs wore a black cartoon-printed hooded sweatshirt, matching sweatpants, and printed white shoes.The next image showed Diggs holding a Loewe Cypress Balls wax candleholder. It is a luxurious home fragrance from Loewe‚Äôs home scents collection. Diggs captioned it: ‚ÄúMomma got me right‚Ä¶damn kids messing up my carpet,‚Äù followed by three weary face emojis.The next image featured @gottaloveechapp reportedly wearing a virtual reality headset and using the device at home.The next post is reportedly his son‚Äôs photo. Diggs is holding the baby, and both are dressed in Christmas pajamas, looking into the camera.A red-and-blue-themed Christmas tree and a mirror are in the background. He captioned it: ‚ÄúOne of my boys first Christmas,‚Äù followed by a dog‚Äôs face emoji.The next image was a close-up of Diggs with a baby dressed in a red ribbon printed white pajama suit and a pink bow hairband.The last IG story showed Diggs‚Äô Grammy-winning partner Cardi B‚Äôs post, in which the rapper is holding their son in front of a football-themed Christmas tree. He captioned it with special instructions for the ‚ÄúBodak Yellow‚Äù singer: ‚ÄúMiss yaw!!! Don‚Äôt be squeezing him too tight you making him soft,‚Äù followed by a smirking face emoji and a mending heart emoji.Cardi B shared a series of snapshots from her wholesome Christmas celebration, too. A user noticed, ‚ÄúThis is the level of Rich I would like to be ...Each kid got their own Christmas treeüòç.‚Äù Another declared, ‚ÄúSay what you want but Cardi is a great mother.‚Äù A third user pin-pointed a finer detail: ‚ÄúMan yall see blossom with the slick down I love it!! üòç merry Christmas üéÅ.‚ÄùAlso Read: Stefon Diggs‚Äô partner Cardi B records Patriots WR‚Äôs mom Stephanie celebrating as New England enters the 2025 NFL Playoffs
Article Summary: New england patriots star wide receiver stefon diggs shared nine instagram stories from his christmas celebration. The patriots‚Äô ig post featuring new england‚Äôs star players, quarterback drake maye, tight end hunter henry, cornerback christian gonzalez, and diggs, in a christmas painting.

Article Title: Elon Musk's net worth: The world's richest man becomes the first ever with $600 billion worth amid SpaceX's valuation surge
Article Text:
Source: Forbes

'US Benefited Immensely From Indians', Says Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Warns US Against Scrapping H-1B

Elon Musk becomes the first person to hit a whopping figure of $600 billion in net worth





Elon Musk‚Äôs wealth surge driven by SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI





SpaceX





Tesla

xAI

Elon Musk‚Äôs rapid rise: From $24 billion to the brink of trillionaire status









Elon Musk has reached a historical financial milestone, as he has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion, as reported in Forbes magazine. This milestone has been achieved during a time when there is newfound interest in his privately owned rocket company, SpaceX, which he believes will make a historical initial start detailing a whopping value of $800 billion with an initial public offering that could potentially take place in 2026.Musk's net worth has not only increased with his involvement with his rocket company, SpaceX, but he has earned a tremendous amount of money with his investment in electric cars with his company, Tesla, where his net worth has increased by a whopping 12% because of his investment in his own artificial intelligence company, xAI.As reported by Forbes, Elon Musk has now broken yet another record by being the first individual to ever reach a net worth of over $600 billion. This achievement has come at a time when his private rocket company, SpaceX, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026. Musk's net worth is also contributed by his stake of 12% in Tesla, an electric vehicle behemoth, and his artificial intelligence company, xAI, both of which keep increasing in value.From groundbreaking innovations in space travel and electric mobility to ambitious AI projects, futuristic ventures, and global business expansions, Musk‚Äôs diversified portfolio and relentless pursuit of technological advancement have cemented his status as the world‚Äôs richest person.SpaceX has also showcased its role in the increasing wealth of Musk to historic levels. With an estimated 42% stake in the firm, the net worth of Musk is expected to grow by an enormous $168 billion if SpaceX continues to retain its current valuation of $800 billion. Analysts also expect it to reach a valuation of $1.5 trillion when it comes to the public market and possibly become the first trillionaire in the world. The innovative nature of SpaceX in terms of its rocket and satellite launches continues to impress the market while affecting the net worth of its CEO.Tesla stock is still an integral part of Musk‚Äôs financial network. His current stake of about 12% in Tesla is valued at $197 billion without taking into consideration the stock options from the 2018 CEO Performance Award that are still winding their way through litigation. Apart from that, Tesla shareholders have just approved what is considered the largest compensation deal of $1 trillion that is pegged on meeting various performance goals, including doubling the current market capitalization eightfold in ten years.Musk‚Äôs AI company, xAI, is also a significant contributor to his net worth. In the advanced talk of raising funding worth $15 billion in fresh equity, the firm is placed at a value of $230 billion. Musk owns about 53% of the firm‚Äôs stakes under xAI Holdings, meaning he has a net worth of about $60 billion. AI is another major sector into which Musk has ventured.Musk's emergence to $600 billion in a short span of time can be noted. He started with $24.6 billion in March 2020 and broke the $100 billion mark later in the same year, and reached $190 billion in January 2021. He broke many records in the last five years with his wealth and became the first person to break $500 billion in October 2025. At present, he leads the richest people in the world by a very large margin of $425 billion over Google co-founder Larry Page and is soon to reach $700 billion.
Article Summary: Elon musk has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion. His private rocket company, spacex, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026.

Article Title: Why did FaZe Clan members exit? Adin Ross explains ownership fight and rejected 20 percent contracts
Article Text:
Why do FaZe Clan members exit? Adin Ross explains ownership fight and rejected 20 percent contracts (Image via Getty)

Adin Ross explains FaZe Clan exits as GameSquare stake dispute while Richard Bengtsone denies involvement







FaZe Clan is in the middle of another big shake-up. The famous esports and creator group has seen many well-known members leave at the same time. Fans are confused and want answers fast. The biggest question is simple: who owns FaZe Clan now, and why are creators quitting together? Right now, GameSquare is the only owner of FaZe Clan. This comes after a long year of changes, buybacks, and exits at the top. As the exits happened, streamer Adin Ross shared his side of the story during a livestream.He claimed the issue was about money and ownership, not drama. At the same time, former FaZe leader Richard Bengtsone, also known as FaZe Banks, stepped in to clear his name. He said he had nothing to do with the recent exits. Here is what happened, step by step.FaZe Clan was started over 15 years ago by Richard Bengtsone. He led the group for years and became the face of the brand. That changed in 2023, when GameSquare bought FaZe Clan in an all-stock deal.In June 2024, Bengtsone returned by buying back 25% of FaZe Clan from GameSquare. Many fans thought this meant stability was back. But the return did not last long.In March 2025, Bengtsone‚Äôs company, Faze Media, sold its stake in FaZe Esports. This move gave GameSquare full control again.A few months later, in July 2025, Bengtsone stepped down as CEO. From that point on, GameSquare became the sole owner of FaZe Clan.Soon after, creators began leaving. On Christmas, QTCinderella, JasonTheWeen, StableRonaldo, Lacy, Adapt, and Silky all posted the same message on X:‚ÄúLeft @FaZeClan‚ÄùAs questions grew, Adin Ross spoke during a livestream. He claimed the exits were linked to a late demand for ownership shares. Ross said:‚ÄúThey never signed that 20% initially. They [GameSquare] come after them a year and a half later and then ask for the 20%‚Ä¶. That‚Äôs in the wrong. ‚ÄòCause if your intention was to sign these guys for 20% of FaZe, they probably would‚Äôve all done it.‚ÄùHe added:‚ÄúBut now, you wait until they‚Äôre big, have millions of followers, so why would they sign the contract? You can‚Äôt put a deal in their fking faces at this point.‚ÄùMany fans then wondered if FaZe Banks was involved. Bengtsone responded on X and shut that down. He wrote that he had ‚Äúnothing to do‚Äù with the situation, said he had moved on, and added that he would help if asked.Also Read: Viral Video Shows Clavicular And N3on Attacked With Red Liquid As Past Crash Livestream Resurfaces Amid Ongoing Kick Ban
Article Summary: Faze clan is in the middle of another big shake-up. The famous esports and creator group has seen many well-known members leave at the same time. This comes after a long year of changes, buybacks, and exits at the top. As the exits happened, streamer adin ross shared his side of the story during a livestream.

The New York Times‚Äô Connections has quickly risen to a favourites list for word game enthusiasts, fusing the addictive elegance of word games such as Wordle with more complex puzzles in the realms of logic and pattern recognition. Daily, players are offered a collection of 16 apparently random words, placed in a 4x4 matrix, which must be grouped into four different thematically consistent sets, requiring a solution that relies on the discovery of often subtle connections, ties, and wordplay. Puzzle enthusiasts seeking a challenging and informative solution will find the December 24, 2025 issue, game number 926, to offer a perfect balance of knowledge and intellect. Connections remains a continuing source of fascination for an international following, a daily challenge for intellectual acuity and mental dexterity.NYT Connections is a very engaging word association game aimed at evaluating the ability to use analytical thinking and logic when problem-solving. In contrast to a normal word game, playing this game requires the ability to distinguish very subtle connections between the words associated with the game, ranging from very straightforward connections to very abstract ones.The game can be played for free through desktop or mobile operating systems on any device at the convenience of the players. Due to the easy-to-grasp game mechanics and the very challenging puzzles required in the game, many people actually make the game a daily routine for themselves.To help players without revealing the solution, here are some strategies for December 24, 2025:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Here are the connection categories available today in the NYT Connections puzzle:Below are the four correct groups for today‚Äôs puzzle:The word choices are arranged in a 4x4 matrix. Find connections between the words to categorize them into four appropriate groups.Yes, the game offers subtle clues so as not to pamper the players.It is also free to download for mobile and computer usage.It improves pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral thinking, and problem-solving abilities.

Daily, players are offered a collection of 16 apparently random words, placed in a 4x4 matrix. Find connections between the words to categorize them into four appropriate groups.

Article Title: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu responds to user asking about Arattai app: ‚ÄòWe will market it ‚Ä¶‚Äô
Article Text:
Arattai app: Features and challenges

One-to-one and group chats with text, voice notes, and media sharing

Audio and video calls with end-to-end encryption

Multi-device support, including desktop and Android TV apps

Stories and channels for broadcasting updates



Arattai app gets end-to-end encryption







Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu was recently asked by an X (formerly Twitter) user why there is no talk about Arattai now? The user quoted a post stating that Telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. Responding to the user‚Äôs question, Vembu shared that the company is doing ‚Äúupdates weekly‚Äù and is working on ‚Äúsome very important features‚Äù. ‚ÄúWe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù Vembu posted, adding ‚ÄúThis is a marathon. We are geared for it.‚ÄùTo recall, the Arattai app debuted in 2021 as a rival to Meta‚Äôs WhatsApp. Years after its launch, the app recently gained momentum after senior government ministers like Piyush Goyal joined the platform. In September this year, Arattai (meaning chat in Tamil) topped App Store ranking, registering 3,50,000 signs in just three days.Arattai offers familiar features such as:However, the app is still ironing out issues. Users have reported OTP delays, slower contact sync, and call glitches due to server overload.Last month, the company rolled out system-wide end-to-end encryption on the Arattai app. Announcing the release in an X post, Vembu then said that it is a ‚Äúforced upgrade on all because it is a drastic change‚Äù.‚ÄúWe had to do some redesign around it and we wanted extensive testing because it is a drastic change. It is now being tested by about 6,000 people in the company. We identified some issues and have fixed them. We are doing one more round of testing on a new build that has fixed the issues identified,‚Äù he then said.
Article Summary: Zoho founder sridhar vembu was recently asked by an x (formerly twitter) user why there is no talk about arattai now. The user quoted a post stating that telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. ‚Äúwe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù vem bu posted, adding ‚Äúthis is a marathon.

Article Title: Vince Zampella, Battlefield chief and Call of Duty co-creator, killed in car accident at 55
Article Text:
Gaming icon Vince Zampella, the visionary behind Call of Duty and leader of Battlefield, tragically passed away at 55 in a car accident. Zampella's career defined modern shooters, co-founding Infinity Ward and later Respawn Entertainment, delivering hits like Apex Legends. His influence on interactive entertainment and inspiration to millions is widely mourned.

Legacy built on Battlefield revival and first-person shooter innovation

‚ÄòCall of Duty‚Äô Creator Vince Zampella Dies In Horrific Highway Crash Caught On Camera

Gaming community mourns visionary Developer who shaped modern shooters





Vince Zampella, the gaming industry titan behind the blockbuster Call of Duty franchise and leader of the Battlefield series, died Sunday in a single-vehicle crash on Angeles Crest Highway near Los Angeles. He was 55. The Ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m., struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire, according to California Highway Patrol reports. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital. Authorities have not confirmed whether alcohol or drugs were factors in the crash.Zampella's career defined modern military shooters. He co-founded Infinity Ward in 2002, where he spearheaded the original Call of Duty in 2003‚Äîa World War II game that evolved into one of gaming's most successful franchises. The series has sold over 500 million copies globally and generated more than $30 billion in revenue.After his contentious 2010 departure from Activision and subsequent legal settlement, Zampella established Respawn Entertainment. The studio delivered critically acclaimed titles including Titanfall, Apex Legends, and the Star Wars Jedi series. Electronic Arts acquired Respawn in 2013, and in 2021, tasked Zampella with revitalizing the struggling Battlefield franchise‚Äîculminating in this year's well-received Battlefield 6."This is an unimaginable loss," Electronic Arts stated Monday. "Vince's influence on the video game industry was profound and far-reaching. His work helped shape modern interactive entertainment and inspired millions of players and developers around the world."Game Awards founder Geoff Keighley called Zampella "an extraordinary person‚Äîa gamer at heart, but also a visionary executive with a rare ability to recognize talent." He added that while Zampella created some of gaming's most influential titles, "I always felt he still had his greatest one ahead of him."A Paramount Pictures live-action Call of Duty film remains in production, ensuring Zampella's creative vision will continue reaching new audiences.
Article Summary: Vince zampella, the visionary behind call of duty and leader of battlefield, died sunday in a car accident. The ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m. struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital.

Article Title: iPhone 16 Pro Max, AirPods Pro 2, iPad 10 and 22 other products Apple discontinued this year
Article Text:
iOS26 now available: Things to know

Apple iPhones discontinued in 2025

iPhone 16 Pro Max (succeeded by iPhone 17 Pro Max)

iPhone 16 Pro (succeeded by iPhone 17 Pro)

iPhone 15 Plus

iPhone 15

iPhone 14 Plus

iPhone 14

iPhone SE (succeeded by iPhone 16e)

Apple iPads discontinued in 2025

iPad Pro with M4 chip (updated with M5 chip)

iPad Air with M2 chip (updated with M3 chip)

iPad 10 (updated with A16 chip)

Apple Watches discontinued in 2025

Apple Watch Ultra 2 (succeeded by Apple Watch Ultra 3)

Apple Watch Series 10 (succeeded by Apple Watch Series 11)

Apple Watch SE 2 (succeeded by Apple Watch SE 3)

Macs discounted in 2025

Mac Studio with M2 Max and M2 Ultra chips (updated with M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips)

14-inch MacBook Pro with M4 chip (updated with M5 chip)

13-inch and 15-inch MacBook Air with M3 chip (updated with M4 chip)

13-inch MacBook Air with M2 chip

AirPods and other Apple accessories discontinued in 2025



AirPods Pro 2 (succeeded by AirPods Pro 3)

Apple Vision Pro with M2 chip (updated with M5 chip)

MagSafe Charger with Qi 2 (succeeded by MagSafe Charger with Qi 2.2 support)

30W USB-C Power Adapter (succeeded by 40W Dynamic Power Adapter with 60W Max)

Lightning to 3.5mm Audio Cable (succeeded by USB-C to 3.5mm Audio Cable)

MagSafe to MagSafe 2 Converter





Apple discontinued more than 20 products in 2025, per a MacRumours report. Most of these products were replaced by newer and faster models, others were simply discontinued because they had been outdated for a long time. For example, 2024's flagship iPhone 16 Pro Max has been discontinued to be replaced with this year‚Äôs iPhone 17 Pro Max. Similarly, Apple AirPods Pro 2 have been replaced by Apple AirPods Pro 3. This year, Apple also phased out the Plus lineup, discontinuing both iPhone 14 Plus and iPhone 15 Plus. The affordable iPhone SE (3rd generation) has also been discontinued, only to be replaced by iPhone 16e. With this, Apple no longer sells any iPhone models with a Home button, Touch ID, LCD screen, a sub-6-inch screen size, or Lightning.The Cupertino-based company also replaced its MagSafe Charger with Qi 2 with the all-new MagSafe Charger with Qi 2.2 support. The 30W USB-C Power Adapter, on the other hand, has been succeeded by 40W Dynamic Power Adapter with 60W Max. Additionally, Apple has updated its 14-inch MacBook Pro with M4 chip to M5 chip. Similarly, the 13-inch and 15-inch MacBook Air models with M3 chip have been upgraded to M4 chip models.Here, we have compiled a list of Apple products in different categories that the company discontinued in 2025.
Article Summary: Apple discontinued more than 20 products in 2025, per a macrumours report. Most of these products were replaced by newer and faster models, others were simply discontinued because they had been outdated for a long time. For example, 2024's flagship iphone 16 pro max has been discontinued to be replaced with this year‚Äôs iphone 17 pro max.
